snippet: The Royal Bank of Canada was accused of orchestrating an elaborate trading scheme in a lawsuit filed on Monday by regulators, who allege that the bank used bogus trades to generate lucrative tax benefits.
abstract: The Royal Bank of Canada was accused of orchestrating an elaborate trading scheme in a lawsuit filed on Monday by regulators, who allege that the bank used bogus trades to generate lucrative tax benefits.

headline.main: Regulator Accuses R.B.C. of 'Massive' Trading Scheme
headline.print_headline: Commodities Agency Accuses Canadian Bank of Internal ‘Fictitious Trades’
